verbs.description: Rather than [V: wait] [ARG2: for any bill to pass Congress that might have placed some limits and rules around actions at the border] , [ARG1: Donald Trump] signed an executive order on Wednesday afternoon which , according to Trump , ‘ ended’ family separation by ordering ...
